name: MovieLens
0:
”Alexa, ask movie lens to tell me about office space”
”Alexa, ask movie lens what should I watch tonight”
”Alexa, tell movie lens I want a quirky comedy”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: movie lens
Developer Terms of Use
des:
This skill will give you movie recommendations and will give information about movies. You can ask MovieLens to find a movie, or you can ask for movie information.

If you want personalized recommendations and predicted movie ratings: 
1. Go to movielens.org and create a user account
2. In the Alexa App, under the MovieLens skill, click on link account and sign in with your MovieLens account credentials.
